name: The Silent Tombs
description:
A game made for Low Effort Jam 16. It was difficult to make something effortless, I had to stop when I was starting to get carried away. The game has glitches and bugs but you can have fun. :)

CONTROLS:

  • MOVE: W,A,S,D
  • ATTACKS: Mouse Left button

Game by Róger Goulart
